reviewText: At last, I am learning about this great camera!!! Excellent Video!! If you have this great camera, buy this video.

A very useful guide which has been well thought out so that every word counts and there is no wasted effort.

It would be useful to have an index to go back and find specific items of interest.

If you know nothing about this camera, this video gives you all of the basics of operation.
Good technical information provided.

This DVD does nothing but go over what the manual contains, only it does it in less depth. I kept waiting to hear something more that "this button selects that" kind of instruction. It never happened. Save your money & read the manual.
